title: siena_diff
description: SIENA_diff: Analysis of longitudinal brain image differences.

debug_flag.title: Debug flag
debug_flag.description: Debug - generate edge images and don't remove temporary images

no_seg_flag.title: No segmentation flag
no_seg_flag.description: Don't segment grey+white separately (because there is poor grey-white contrast)

ignore_z_flow_flag.title: Ignore Z flow flag
ignore_z_flow_flag.description: Ignore flow in z (may be beneficial if top of brain is missing)

segment_options.title: Segmentation options
segment_options.description: Options to be passed to segmentation (type 'fast' to get these)
